alert.note: Alert for Chase; Deuel; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 9:02PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds from a line of showers will impact portions Perkins, southern Keith, Chase, southwestern Lincoln, southeastern Deuel and western Hayes Counties through 945 PM CDT/845 PM MDT/... At 900 PM CDT/800 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Big Springs to near Wauneta. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph along with areas of blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Imperial, Grant, Big Springs, Wauneta, Wallace, Brule, Madrid, Venango, Elsie, Lamar, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Barton, Enders, Champion, Crete, Chase, Center Dam Campground, Megeath, Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area and Grainton. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 84. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 97 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chase; Deuel; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins
